text: Japheth is one of the sons of Noah in the Bible. Japheth may also refer to: * Japheth Kimutai (born 1978), Kenyan middle-distance runner * Japhet Korir (born 1993), Kenyan long-distance runner and 2013 World Cross Country Champion * Levi ben Japheth (11th century), Karaite Jewish scholar * Israel Meyer Japhet (1818–1892), German cantor and grammarian * Gilad Japhet, MyHeritage founder * Maggott, a comic book superhero whose real name is Japheth
title: Japheth (disambiguation)
